item.title: Art with Cellular Automata
item.description: tags Art Cellular automata have been used a lot to create various forms of Generative art. Here is a collection of some interesting examples: Examples based on Neural CA Self organizing textures: (Niklasson et al. 2021) Dialogue: an art project using interacting Neural CA to generate patterns Revisiting classical CA Crosshatch CA CA Music Wolfram tones Bibliography Eyvind Niklasson, Alexander Mordvintsev, Ettore Randazzo, Michael Levin. February 11, 2021. "Self-organising Textures"
